casebody.data:
DULAY
v.
TESTA. 2015-2111 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 23, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On joint motion to defer oral argument and return the case to mediation. Motion granted. The oral argument scheduled before a master commissioner for Tuesday, March 27, 2018, is vacated. The court refers this case to mediation under S.Ct.Prac.R. 19.01 and stays all filing deadlines for the case until further order of this court. The court will not issue any decision on the merits of this case until mediation has concluded.
